text: Ponnaramthottathe Raajaavu is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Anil, Babu Narayanan, starring Jagadish and Urvashi in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Urvashi as Radhika * Jagadish as Unnikrishna Menon * Suresh Gopi as Jacob * KPAC Lalitha as Dakshayani *Philomina as Nanithalla * Sainudeen as Velayudhan * Baby Shilpa as Shilpa * Beena Antony as Geetha *Sankaradi as Madhava Menon * Sukumari as Saraswathiamma * M.S. Thripunithura as Commissioner *Bobby Kottarakkara as Peethambharan *Paravoor Bharathan as Vasu Menon *Devan as Sudhakaran *Kunjikkuttan Thampuran as man in the bus *Krishnankutty Nair as Kidangoor Raman *Meena Ganesh as Maluvamma *Subair as Supermarket manager ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ponnaramthottathe Raajaavu
